title: Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit | 25 Guided STEM Experiment Lessons | 48 Page Color Student Guide | Grades 3-6 | Ages 8+ | Play & Learn | Parents' Choice Silver Award Winner
descriptions:
**Discover the Wonders of Electricity with Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit!**

Unleash the power of learning with the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit, an electrifying adventure into the world of STEM education designed for young scientists from grades 3-6, ages 8 and up. Winner of the Parents' Choice Silver Award, this kit is perfect for inquisitive minds ready to explore the fundamentals of electric motors and generators through hands-on experience!

**Spark Curiosity with 25 Engaging Experiments**

Dive into 25 guided STEM experiments that bring the excitement of discovery right to your fingertips. With this kit, you'll delve into the fascinating interplay between magnetic fields and electric currents, uncover the secrets of energy conversion, and build a solid foundation in physics and engineering.

**Full-Color Learning at Your Pace**

Get lost in the vibrant pages of the 48-page color student guide, packed with easy-to-follow instructions and rich educational content. The 60-page, full-color manual, updated in 2012, provides additional insights, ensuring a comprehensive understanding of the principles at play.

**Award-Winning Educational Experience**

Proud recipient of the Parents' Choice Silver Award, the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit is recognized for its exceptional educational value, engaging activities, and quality learning outcomes.

**Features That Electrify Imagination**

- **Transparent Electric Motor**: Witness the magic of motion as electricity powers the motor, made with transparent plastic for an unobstructed view of the inner workings.
- **Dual-Function Dynamics**: Easily reconfigure the battery-powered motor into a hand-cranked electric generator, showcasing the duality of this innovative device.
- **Magnetism & Circuits**: Experiment with magnets, build simple circuits, and learn about gears and drive-trains, enhancing your understanding with each activity.

**Designed for Young Learners**

Measuring 13.1 inches in height, 8.9 inches in width, and a lightweight 1.3 pounds, this compact kit is perfect for little hands and curious minds. Designed with safety and education in mind, it meets the minimum age requirement of 8 years, aligning with the cognitive abilities and interests of children in grades 3-6.

**Unlock the Potential of Play & Learn**

With the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit, playtime becomes an immersive learning journey. Explore the realms of STEM, and encourage a lifelong passion for science and innovation.

**Get Your Kit Today!**

Don't miss out on the opportunity to provide your child with an award-winning, educational experience. Order the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit now and energize your child's education with the power of play!

**Unleash the Power of Science with Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit!**

🔍 **Discover the Wonders of Physics!**

Spark curiosity and a love for science in young minds with the award-winning Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit! Designed for bright learners in Grades 3-6, this kit is perfect for kids aged 8 and up who are eager to explore the fascinating world of STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics).

🏆 **Award-Winning Learning Adventure!**

Proud winner of the Parents' Choice Silver Award, this kit has been recognized for its exceptional educational value, engaging activities, and high-quality learning outcomes. Your child will feel like a real scientist as they dive into 25 hands-on experiments that are both enlightening and entertaining!

📘 **Educational Excellence at Your Fingertips!**

With a vibrant 48-page color student guide and a comprehensive 60-page full-color manual, your young inventor will have all the instructions and insights needed to understand complex concepts with ease. Each experiment is designed to teach the fundamentals of how electric motors and generators work, unraveling the mysteries of magnetic fields and electric currents.

🌟 **Features That Ignite Imagination!**

- **Transparent Electric Motor**: Watch electricity turn into motion with a motor made of transparent plastic, providing an inside look at the mechanics at work!
- **Dual Functionality**: Discover the magic of energy conversion by transforming the kit into a battery-powered motor or a hand-crank electric generator.
- **Magnetism & Circuits**: Experiment with magnets, build simple circuits, and explore gears and drive-trains to see science in action.
- **Energy Conversion Learning**: Grasp the principles of kinetic to electrical energy transformation, and vice versa, fostering a deeper understanding of energy resources.

📏 **Compact and Classroom Friendly!**

Measuring 13.1 inches in height, 8.9 inches in width, and 2.6 inches in depth, with a weight of just 1.3 pounds, this kit is perfect for both home and classroom use. Its compact size makes it easy to store and set up wherever learning takes place.

💡 **A Brighter Future with Every Experiment!**

The Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit is not just a toy; it's a bridge to knowledge and inspiration. As children play, learn, and experiment, they are laying the groundwork for a brighter, science-literate future.

🎁 **The Perfect Gift for Curious Minds!**

Give the gift of exploration and education. Whether it's for a birthday, holiday, or just because, this science kit is the perfect present for kids who have a keen interest in how the world works.

🛒 **Order Now!**

Don't wait to ignite the spark of creativity and innovation in your child. Add the Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit to your cart today and watch your young scientist's imagination soar to new heights!
